languages.text: {n}Мужчина улыбается во всю ширь мерзкого рта.{/n} "Я — Лекокт, кламавус Кормителей страждущих. Я — Тот-кто-говорит-к-Пращуру. Хозяин корабля".
{n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина улыбается во всю ширь мерзкого рта.{/n} "Я — Лекокт, кламавус Кормителей страждущих. Я — Тот-кто-говорит-к-Пращуру. Хозяин корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-who-Speaks-to-Our-Forebear. This ship belongs to me."
{n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-who-Speaks-to-Our-Forebear. This ship belongs to me."
{n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."
{n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."
{n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

languages.text: {n}El hombre sonríe tan ampliamente como su espantosa boca le permite.{/n} «Soy Lecocte, Clamavus de los Nutridores de los Afligidos. Soy El Que Habla Con El Progenitor. Esta nave es mía».
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre sonríe tan ampliamente como su espantosa boca le permite.{/n} «Soy Lecocte, Clamavus de los Nutridores de los Afligidos. Soy El Que Habla Con El Progenitor. Esta nave es mía».

languages.text: {n}这个人露出了那张丑陋的大嘴能咧出的最灿烂的笑容。{/n}“我是勒克特，滋养者教派的传教使。我是元祖之口，也是这艘船的主人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人露出了那张丑陋的大嘴能咧出的最灿烂的笑容。{/n}“我是勒克特，滋养者教派的传教使。我是元祖之口，也是这艘船的主人。”

languages.text: {n}男は、限界までその不快な口元をニヤリと広げる。{/n}「私はルコット、苦しむ者を育むクラマヴァスだ。そして我々の始祖に語りかける者でもある。これは私の船だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は、限界までその不快な口元をニヤリと広げる。{/n}「私はルコット、苦しむ者を育むクラマヴァスだ。そして我々の始祖に語りかける者でもある。これは私の船だ」

languages.text: {n}Der Mann lächelt so breit, wie sein abnormer Mund es zulässt.{/n} "Ich bin Lecocte, Clamavus der Nährer der Heimgesuchten. Ich bin Der-der-mit-unserem-Progenitor-spricht. Dieses Schiff gehört mir."
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann lächelt so breit, wie sein abnormer Mund es zulässt.{/n} "Ich bin Lecocte, Clamavus der Nährer der Heimgesuchten. Ich bin Der-der-mit-unserem-Progenitor-spricht. Dieses Schiff gehört mir."

languages.text: {n}L'homme arbore le sourire le plus large que son abominable bouche peut produire.{/n} « Je m'appelle Lecocte. Je suis le clamavus des Nourrisseurs des souffrants, celui qui parle à notre Géniteur. Ce vaisseau m'appartient. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme arbore le sourire le plus large que son abominable bouche peut produire.{/n} « Je m'appelle Lecocte. Je suis le clamavus des Nourrisseurs des souffrants, celui qui parle à notre Géniteur. Ce vaisseau m'appartient. »

languages.text: {n}Menfur ağzının el verdiğince, kocaman sırıtıyor.{/n} "Adım Lecocte, Müteessirleri Besleyenler'in Klamavusu'yum. Bendeniz, Ata'mızla Konuşan'ım. Bu gemi de benim iskânım."
languages.original_text: {n}The man smiles the broadest smile his abominable mouth can produce.{/n} "I am Lecocte, Clamavus of the Nourishers of the Afflicted. I am He-Who-Speaks-to-Our-Progenitor. This ship belongs to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Menfur ağzının el verdiğince, kocaman sırıtıyor.{/n} "Adım Lecocte, Müteessirleri Besleyenler'in Klamavus'uyum. Bendeniz, Ata'mızla Konuşan'ım. Bu gemi de benim iskânım."
